programme.title: Munich
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Eric Bana and Daniel Craig. Following the assassination of 11 Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympic Games in Munich, Israel's Prime Minister Golda Meir recruits a hit squad to track down and execute the 11 Palestinian leaders held responsible for the atrocity. The team is led by Mossad agent Avner, but, as the killings mount up, a heavy toll is paid by the men Steven Spielberg - Director Eric Bana - Avner Daniel Craig - Steve Ciaran Hinds - Carl Mathieu Kassovitz - Robert Hanns Zischler - Hans Ayelet Zurer - Daphna Geoffrey Rush - Ephraim Michel Lonsdale - Papa Mathieu Amalric - Louis Lynn Cohen - Golda Meir Moritz Bleibtreu - Andreas Valéria Bruni-Tedeschi - Sylvie Marie-Josée Croze - Jeanette Yvan Attal - Tony Brian Goodman - Belligerent American Richard Brake - Belligerent American Robert Burke - Belligerent American Eric Bana - Avner Daniel Craig - Steve Ciaran Hinds - Carl Mathieu Kassovitz - Robert Hanns Zischler - Hans Ayelet Zurer - Daphna Geoffrey Rush - Ephraim Michel Lonsdale - Papa Mathieu Amalric - Louis Lynn Cohen - Golda Meir Moritz Bleibtreu - Andreas Valéria Bruni-Tedeschi - Sylvie Marie-Josée Croze - Jeanette Yvan Attal - Tony Brian Goodman - Belligerent American Richard Brake - Belligerent American Robert Burke - Belligerent American.

programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. programme.title: The Persian Version
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Layla Mohammadi. Iranian-American film-maker Leila has a complicated relationship with her New York family - especially her mother Shireen, who disapproves of Leila's sexuality. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". programme.title: Snack Shack
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy drama starring Conor Sherry and Gabriel LaBelle. In 1990s Nebraska, best friends AJ and Moose need to find summer jobs. When they get the chance to take over the dilapidated refreshment stand at their local swimming pool, the pair throw themselves into their new venture - much to the horror of their parents and delight of their friends. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. programme.title: No Hard Feelings

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Richard Gere is the male escort framed for murder in this stylised and sexy 80s thriller from Taxi Driver writer Paul Schrader. Contains discriminatory language. (1980)(112 mins).

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: Enigmatic loner Alan Ladd fights to help ranchers survive against land-hungry cattlemen, including sadistic gunslinger Jack Palance. Seminal Western action. (1953)(114 mins).

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Unscrupulous fighter Kirk Douglas boxes his way to the top, but mistreats everyone around him along the way. Acclaimed drama co-starring Marilyn Maxwell. (1949)(99 mins).

programme.title: The Big Heat
programme.desc: 1950's American film noir crime drama following a straight-arrow police detective as he takes on the crime syndicate that controls his city. (1953)(90 mins).

programme.title: Gorillas In The Mist
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Sigourney Weaver stars as Dian Fossey, the US scientist who dedicated her life to studying and protecting the mountain gorillas of Rwanda. Drama. (1988)(125 mins).

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Police chief Roy Scheider hunts the killer shark menacing his peaceful seaside community. Spielberg's classic thriller. Moderate language/violent scenes/flashing images. (1975)(120 mins).

programme.title: Alfie (1966)
programme.desc: London lothario Michael Caine charms Shelley Winters, Eleanor Bron and Jane Asher in this swinging 60s drama nominated for five Oscars. Moderate violence/sex references. (1966)(108 mins).

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday goes awry when her family forgets about it. 1980s John Hughes coming-of-age comedy. Language/sex/mature themes. (1984)(88 mins).

programme.title: Pretty In Pink
programme.desc: Oddball John Cryer loves best pal Molly Ringwald, but she fancies rich kid Andrew McCarthy - cue teen angst in this Brat Pack classic. Discriminatory content/language. (1986)(92 mins).

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Spike Jonze's offbeat comedy stars John Cusack as a puppeteer who discovers a portal into the mind of actor John Malkovich. With Cameron Diaz. Strong language/sex. (1999)(108 mins).

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: Stifled suburbanite Kevin Spacey impulsively overhauls his life, creating friction with wife Annette Bening. Oscar-winning drama from Sam Mendes. Strong language/sex. (1999)(117 mins).

programme.title: American Gigolo

programme.title: Snack Shack
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy drama starring Conor Sherry and Gabriel LaBelle. In 1990s Nebraska, best friends AJ and Moose need to find summer jobs. programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Mark Hughes
programme.desc: Sparky walks us through his many successful years at Old Trafford and the thinking behind his decision to manage Man City years later.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Paul McShane
programme.desc: The United Academy graduate tells his story of coming through the ranks but having to seek out a career away from Old Trafford.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Ruud van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: The goalscoring machine looks back on his career; how a move to Old Trafford nearly fell apart, his rivalry with Arsenal, and training with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Andy Ritchie
programme.desc: Stitch looks back on a career which includes scoring a hat-trick for Manchester United against bitter rivals Leeds.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast: Tony Coton
programme.desc: The former goalkeeper turned coach is now a scout at the club, and he joined the UTD Podcast to look back on his past, while working on United's future.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Jonathan Greening
programme.desc: Jono tells the Pod how much it meant to him to be on the bench for the Champions League Final in 1999, and how it nearly all came down to a game of pool with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Javier Hernandez
programme.desc: Chicharito looks back on the emotional moment he was told he'd be heading to Old Trafford, and all the iconic moments that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Paddy Crerand
programme.desc: Paddy lets us in on the 1968 European Cup afterparty, revealing which song Sir Matt Busby was singing for the rest of the night.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Tom Heaton
programme.desc: The ex-United Academy goalkeeper is back at the club and we caught up with him in the days following his return.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Sir Alex
programme.desc: This is the one. Your 60 minutes with The Boss. We covered everything from Cristiano Ronaldo's dramatic Old Trafford return, to signing Eric Cantona on a lunch break.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Christian Eriksen
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Christian Eriksen. He addresses the obstacles he has overcome and explains why he left Italy, swapping Inter Milan for a return to the Premier League.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Paul McGuinness
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former academy coach Paul McGuinness who shares stories about his farther Wilf and Uncle Bobby.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - John O'Shea
programme.desc: Sheasy told us about the tough lesson he learned at the hands of Roy Keane, and why he thinks Sir Alex trusted him to play in every position at the club.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Rio Ferdinand
programme.desc: Rio and the Pod team explore Old Trafford to recall his memories on the pitch, bust-ups in the tunnel and inspirational team talks in the dressing room.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Ben Foster

programme.title: Live NFL: Commanders @ Ravens
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Washington Commanders @ Baltimore Ravens NFL
programme.desc: Washington (4-1) leads the NFL with 31.0 points per game this season; Baltimore (3-2) leads the all-time series, 4-3, after securing a 31-17 victory on Oct. 4, 2020, as QB Lamar Jackson ran for a 50-yard TD and threw for 193 yards and two scores.

programme.title: Live NFL: Lions @ Cowboys
programme.sub-title: Season 2024 Live: Detroit Lions @ Dallas Cowboys NFL
programme.desc: Jared Goff threw for 292 yards and two TDs, as Detroit (3-1) beat Seattle, 42-29, on Sept. 30; Dallas (3-2) has won the past six meetings with the Lions, including a 20-19 victory last season, as CeeDee Lamb had 13 receptions for 227 yards and a TD.
